title: (x) "Puerto Rico - Explore beyond the shore" ad - Mason Sans {Yves}
content:
I’m looking for the name of the font used in this ad for Puerto Rico.

[http://content.yieldmanager.com/atoms/63/66/63664f2cf04eca8adc5f41d72fc8...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209044911/http:/content.yieldmanager.com/atoms/63/66/63664f2cf04eca8adc5f41d72fc82a03.jpg "http://content.yieldmanager.com/atoms/63/66/63664f2cf04eca8adc5f41d72fc82a03.jpg")

 [‹ (x) Chunky round stencil font - Kada {Tom Lukacs}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209044911/http:/typophile.com/node/29554 "Go to previous forum topic") [Black and White and RED all over... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209044911/http:/typophile.com/node/29519 "Go to next forum topic")
author: chimerical
